special_abilities.name: Dwarven Resilience
special_abilities.desc: Ahmaergo has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

special_abilities.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
special_abilities.desc: Ahmaergo can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

special_abilities.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, Ahmaergo can regain 20 hit points.

special_abilities.name: Extra Damage
special_abilities.desc: If Ahmaergo has more than half his hit points remaining he deals an extra 7 (2d6) slashing damage on every hit.

actions.description: Ahmaergo makes three attacks with his greataxe.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) slashing damage
actions.name: Greataxe

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Heavy Crossbow

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Ammalia is a 9th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): friends, mage hand, mending, message
- 1st level (4 slots): charm person, mage armor, magic missile
- 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, invisibility, suggestion
- 3rd level (3 slots): fireball, haste, tongues
- 4th level (3 slots): confusion, stoneskin
- 5th level (1 slot): hold monster

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.
actions.name: Quarterstaff

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Barnibus is a 7th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks) He has the following wizard spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): blade ward, light, mage hand, message
- 1st level (4 slots): comprehend languages, identify, detect magic, mage armor, shield
- 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, suggestion
- 3rd level (3 slots): clairvoyance, sending
- 4th level (1 slot): locate creature, Otiluke's resilient sphere

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Barnibus carries a wand of magic detection. (spell included in spell list below but does not use a slot when cast from the wand)

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

special_abilities.name: Cunning Action
special_abilities.desc: On each of her turns, the Black Viper can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

special_abilities.name: Evasion
special_abilities.desc: If the Black Viper is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails. She can't use this trait if she's incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
special_abilities.desc: The Black Viper deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the Black Viper that isn't incapacitated and the Black Viper doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.description: The Black Viper makes three attacks with her rapier.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Rapier

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Hand Crossbow

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Davil is a 12th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks) He has the following bard spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): mage hand, mending, minor illusion, vicious mockery
- 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, disguise self, sleep
- 2nd level (3 slots): crown of madness, invisibility, suggestion
- 3rd level (3 slots): nondetection, sending, tongues
- 4th level (3 slots): compulsion, freedom of movement, polymorph
- 5th level (2 slots): dominate person, greater restoration
- 6th level (1 slot): Otto's irresistible dance

special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilities.desc: Davil has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilities.desc: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Gunslinger
special_abilities.desc: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature or attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on the drow's ranged attack rolls with a pistol. In addition, the drow ignores half cover and three-quarters cover when making ranged attacks with a pistol.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.description: The drow makes two shortsword attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) poison damage.
actions.name: Poisonous Pistol

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Durnan wields a sword of sharpness (greatsword) called Grimvault. He wears boots of striding and springing, elven chain, and a ring of spell turning.

special_abilities.name: Indomitable (Recharges after a Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: Durnan can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

special_abilities.name: Spell Turning
special_abilities.desc: While wearing his ring of spell turning, Durnan has advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only him (not in an area of effect). If Durnan rolls a 20 for the save and the spell is 7th level or lower, the spell has no effect on him and instead targets the caster, using the slot level, spell save DC, attack bonus, and spellcasting ability of the caster.

actions.description: Durnan makes four melee weapon attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is an object, the hit instead deals 16 slashing damage. If the target is a creature and Durnan rolls a 20 on the d20 for the attack roll, the target takes an extra 14 slashing damage, and Durnan rolls another d20. On a roll of 20, he lops off one of the target's limbs, or some other part of its body if it is limbless.
actions.name: Grimvault

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Double Crossbow

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit (with disadvantage against a target within 5 ft.), reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage, or 11 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage while mounted.
actions.name: Lance

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

actions.description: The rider wears a magic ring with which it can cast the feather fall spell on itself once as a reaction to falling. After the spell is cast, the ring becomes nonmagical.
actions.name: Feather Fall

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Hlam is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks) He has the following cleric spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): guidance, light, sacred flame, spare the dying
- 1st level (4 slots): detect evil and good, healing word, sanctuary, shield of faith
- 2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, prayer of healing, silence
- 3rd level (2 slots): protection from energy, remove curse, sending

special_abilities.name: Evasion
special_abilities.desc: If Hlam is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails. He can't use this trait if he's incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Magic Attacks
special_abilities.desc: Hlam's unarmed strikes are magical.

special_abilities.name: Unarmored Defense
special_abilities.desc: While Hlam is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Wisdom modifier.

actions.description: Hlam attacks three times using his unarmed strike, darts, or both.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (1d10 + 7) bludgeoning, magic damage. If the target is a creature, Hlam can choose one of the following additional effects:
The target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding (Hlam's choice).
The target must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.
The target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of Hlam's next turn.
actions.name: Unarmed Strike

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d4 + 7) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dart

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: The target must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is reduced to 0 hit points. On a successful save, the target takes 55 (10d10) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Quivering Palm (Recharge 6)

actions.description: Hlam regains 60 hit points.
actions.name: Wholeness of Body (Recharges after a Long Rest)

special_abilities.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
special_abilities.desc: Hrabbaz can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

special_abilities.name: Relentless Endurance (Recharges after a Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: When Hrabbaz is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, he drops to 1 hit point instead.

special_abilities.name: Extra Damage
special_abilities.desc: As long as Hrabbaz has more than half his hit points left he deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage on all hits.

actions.description: Hrabbaz makes three attacks with his morningstar.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Morningstar

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Istrid is a 9th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks) She has the following cleric spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): light, mending, sacred flame, spare the dying
- 1st level (4 slots): divine favor, guiding bolt, healing word, shield of faith
- 2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, magic weapon, hold person, silence, spiritual weapon
- 3rd level (3 slots): beacon of hope, crusader's mantle, dispel magic, revivify, spirit guardians, water walk
- 4th level (3 slots): banishment, freedom of movement, guardian of faith, stoneskin
- 5th level (1 slot): flame strike, mass cure wounds, hold monster

special_abilities.name: Dwarven Resilience
special_abilities.desc: Istrid has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

actions.description: Istrid makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Maul

actions.description: Istrid magically pinpoints precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of her.
actions.name: Treasure Sense (3/Day)

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Jalester carries a badge of the Watch.

special_abilities.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, Jalester can regain 16 (1d10 + 11) hit points.

actions.description: Jalester makes two weapon attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage when used with two hands.
actions.name: Longsword

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

name: Jarlaxle Baenre
subtitle: Medium humanoid(elf), chaotic neutral
languages: Abyssal, Common, Draconic, Dwarvish, Elvish, Undercommon

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Jarlaxle wears +3 leather armor, a hat of disguise, a bracer of flying daggers, a cloak of invisibility, a knave's eye patch, and a ring of truth telling. He wields a +3 rapier and carries a portable hole and a wand of web. His hat is adorned with a feather of diatryma summoning.

special_abilities.name: Evasion
special_abilities.desc: If he is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Jarlaxle instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails. He can't use this trait if he's incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilities.desc: Jarlaxle has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Jarlaxle fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Master Attuner
special_abilities.desc: Jarlaxle can attune to up to five magic items, and he can attune to magic items that normally require attunement by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard.

special_abilities.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
special_abilities.desc: Jarlaxle deals an extra 24 (7d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Jarlaxle's that isn't incapacitated and Jarlaxle doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

special_abilities.name: Suave Defense
special_abilities.desc: While Jarlaxle is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Charisma modifier.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: When not wearing his knave's eye patch, Jarlaxle has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.description: Jarlaxle makes three attacks with his +3 rapier or two attacks with daggers created by his bracer of flying daggers.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (1d8 + 9) piercing damage.
actions.name: +3 Rapier

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d4 + 6) piercing damage.
actions.name: Flying Dagger

name: Laeral Silverhand
subtitle: Medium humanoid(human), chaotic good
languages: Common, Draconic, Dwarvish, Elvish, Giant, Infernal

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Laeral is a 19th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 21, +13 to hit with spell attacks). Laeral has the following wizard spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): light, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, ray of frost
- 1st level: detect magic, disguise self, magic missile, shield
- 2nd level: detect thoughts, invisibility, misty step
- 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fly, sending, tongues
- 4th level (3 slots): banishment, greater invisibility, Otiluke's resilient sphere
- 5th level (3 slots): cone of cold, geas, Rary's telepathic bond
- 6th level (2 slots): globe of invulnerability, mass suggestion
- 7th level (1 slot): prismatic spray, teleport
- 8th level (1 slot): feeblemind, power word stun
- 9th level (1 slot): time stop

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Laeral wears a white robe of the archmagi (accounted for in her statistics). She wields a flame tongue longsword.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: While wearing her robe of the archmagi, Laeral has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: Laeral makes three attacks with her silver hair and flame tongue, in any combination. She can cast one of her cantrips or 1st-level spells before or after making these attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d6) force damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Silver Hair

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage when used with two hands.
actions.name: Flame Tongue

actions.description:
Magical, heatless, silver fire harmlessly erupts from Laeral and surrounds her until she is incapacitated or until she uses an action to quench it. She gains one of the following benefits of her choice, which lasts until the silver fire ends:
She can breathe underwater.
She can survive without food and water.
She is immune to magic that would ascertain her thoughts, truthfulness, alignment, or creature type.
She gains resistance to cold damage, and she is unharmed by temperatures as low as -50 degrees Fahrenheit.
While the silver fire is present, she has the following additional action options:
Cast the cure wounds spell. The target regains 1d8 + 5 hit points. After Laeral takes this action, roll a d6. On a roll of 1, the silver fire disappears.
Cast the revivify spell without material components. After Laeral takes this action, roll a d6. On a roll of 1-2, the silver fire disappears.
Release a 60-foot line of silver fire that is 5 feet wide or a 30-foot cone of silver fire. Objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried take 26 (4d12) fire damage. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 26 (4d12) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. After Laeral takes this action, roll a d6. On a roll of 1-3, the silver fire disappears.
actions.name: Spellfire (Recharges after a Long Rest)

name: Manshoon
subtitle: Medium humanoid(human), lawful evil
languages: Common, Draconic, Goblin, Infernal, Orc, Undercommon

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Manshoon is an 18th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 21, +15 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
- 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield
- 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, misty step
- 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, lightning bolt, sending
- 4th level (3 slots): fire shield, greater invisibility, polymorph
- 5th level (3 slots): Bigby's hand, scrying, wall of force
- 6th level (1 slot): flesh to stone, globe of invulnerability
- 7th level (1 slot): finger of death, simulacrum
- 8th level (1 slot): feeblemind, mind blank
- 9th level (1 slot): imprisonment, power word kill

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Manshoon wears a black robe of the archmagi and wields a staff of power (both accounted for in his statistics). Roll 2d10 to determine how many charges the staff has remaining.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: While wearing his robe of the archmagi, Manshoon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Metal Fist

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands. Manshoon can expend 1 of the staff's charges to deal an extra 3 (1d6) force damage on a hit.
actions.name: Staff of Power

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Meloon wields Azuredge but can't attune to it, and thus gains none of its benefits.

special_abilities.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
special_abilities.desc: Meloon can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

special_abilities.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, Meloon can regain 20 hit points.

actions.description: Meloon makes four attacks with Azuredge.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.name: Azuredge

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Mirt wears bracers of defense and a ring of regeneration. He wields a +1 longsword and a +1 dagger.

special_abilities.name: Brute
special_abilities.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Mirt hits with it (included in the attacks below).

special_abilities.name: Evasion
special_abilities.desc: If he is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Mirt instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails. He can't use this trait if he's incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
special_abilities.desc: Mirt deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Mirt's that isn't incapacitated and Mirt doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.description: Mirt makes three attacks: two with his +1 longsword and one with his +1 dagger.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage when used with two hands.
actions.name: +1 Longsword

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: +1 Dagger

name: Nimblewright
subtitle: Medium construct, unaligned
languages: understands one language known to its creator but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The nimblewright has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: The nimblewright's weapon attacks are magical.

special_abilities.name: Repairable
special_abilities.desc: As long as it has at least 1 hit point remaining, the nimblewright regains 1 hit point when a mending spell is cast on it.

special_abilities.name: Sure-Footed
special_abilities.desc: The nimblewright has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.description: The nimblewright makes three attacks: two with its rapier and one with its dagger.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Rapier

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Rapier

special_abilities.name: Dwarven Resilience
special_abilities.desc: Ott has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage.

special_abilities.name: Dark Devotion
special_abilities.desc: The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.
actions.name: Scimitar

actions.description: Saeth makes two longsword attacks. If he has a shortsword drawn, he can also make a shortsword attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.
actions.name: Longsword

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Skeemo is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks) He has the following wizard spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation
- 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield
- 2nd level (3 slots): misty step, suggestion
- 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, fly
- 4th level (3 slots): greater invisibility, ice storm
- 5th level (1 slot): cone of cold

special_abilities.name: Gnome Cunning
special_abilities.desc: Skeemo has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

special_abilities.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
special_abilities.desc: Tashlyn can reroll a saving throw that she fails. She must use the new roll.

special_abilities.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, Tashlyn can regain 20 hit points.

special_abilities.name: Extra Damage
special_abilities.desc: Tashlyn deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage to every hit if she has more than half her hit points remaining.

actions.description: Tashlyn makes three attacks with her greatsword or her shortbow.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Greatsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortbow

special_abilities.name: Dwarven Resilience
special_abilities.desc: Thorvin has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Club

special_abilities.name: Assassinate
special_abilities.desc: During its first turn, Urstul has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Urstul scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

special_abilities.name: Evasion
special_abilities.desc: If Urstul is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Urstul instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

special_abilities.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
special_abilities.desc: Urstul deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Urstul that isn't incapacitated and Urstul doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.description: Urstul makes two shortsword attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Light Crossbow

name: Vajra Safahr
subtitle: Medium humanoid(human), lawful neutral
languages: Common, Dwarvish, Elvish, Giant, Halfling, Undercommon

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Vajra is an 18th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 18, +12 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, message, prestidigitation
- 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, mage armor, thunderwave
- 2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, misty step, web
- 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fly, sending
- 4th level (3 slots): banishment, fire shield, stoneskin
- 5th level (3 slots): Bigby's hand, geas, telekinesis
- 6th level (1 slot): chain lightning, globe of invulnerability
- 7th level (1 slot): forcecage, prismatic spray
- 8th level (1 slot): antimagic field, power word stun
- 9th level (1 slot): imprisonment

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Vajra wields the Blackstaff, accounted for in her statistics. Roll 2d10 to determine how many charges the staff has remaining.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Vajra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Staff Spells
special_abilities.desc: While holding the blackstaff, Vajra can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using her spell save DC and spell attack bonus: cone of cold (5 charges), fireball (5th-level version, 5 charges), globe of invulnerability (6 charges), hold monster (5 charges), levitate (2 charges), lightning bolt (5th-level version, 5 charges), magic missile (1 charge), Ray of Enfeeblement (1 charge), or wall of force (5 charges).

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning, magic damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning, magic damage when used with two hands. Vajra can expend 1 of the staff's charges to deal an extra 3 (1d6) force damage on a hit.
actions.name: Blackstaff

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Victoro is a 15th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Victoro has the following cleric spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): guidance, light, mending, spare the dying, thaumaturgy
- 1st level (4 slots): charm person, command, detect magic, disguise self, protection from evil and good, sanctuary
- 2nd level (3 slots): augury, lesser restoration, mirror image, pass without trace, spiritual weapon
- 3rd level (3 slots): blink, clairvoyance, dispel magic, magic circle, protection from energy
- 4th level (3 slots): banishment, dimension door, divination, freedom of movement, polymorph
- 5th level (2 slots): dominate person, flame strike, modify memory, insect plague
- 6th level (1 slot): heal
- 7th level (1 slot): divine word
- 8th level (1 slot): earthquake

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Victoro wears a ring of protection and glamoured studded leather disguised to look like fine clothing. He carries a rod of rulership shaped like a ruby-tipped cane.

special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilities.desc: Victoro has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Rod of Rulership
special_abilities.desc: Victoro can use an action to present the rod and command obedience from each creature of his choice that he can see within 120 feet of him. Each target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed for 8 hours by Victoro. While charmed in this way, the creature regards Victoro as its trusted leader. If harmed by Victoro or his companions, or commanded to do something contrary to its nature, a target ceases to be charmed in this way. The rod can't be used again until the next dawn.

actions.description: Victoro makes two attacks with his rapier.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Rapier

actions.description: Victoro becomes invisible until the end of his next turn. He becomes visible early immediately after he attacks or casts a spell.
actions.name: Cloak of Shadows (2/Day)

actions.description: Victoro summons a barbed devil. The devil appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of Victoro, acts as Victoro's ally, and can't summon other devils. It remains for 1 minute, until it or Victoro dies, or until Victoro dismisses it as an action.
actions.name: Summon Devil (Recharges after 9 Days)
